settings.content: If you are facing a problem with installation, importing sample config or configuration our theme, please, don’t leave a bad review. Firstly, visit our [Wiki page](https://wiki.the4.co) and try to find a solution. Or you can create a new topic and we will help you as soon as possible: [support page](https://support.the4.co). You can ask your any kind of technical question directly through the [contact email here](mailto://the4studio.net@gmail.com?subject=[Elessi]+Theme+Support). We would be glad if you help us to improve our theme, installation process or documentation. Thanks for buying my theme.!

settings.label: Use Select variants clicking images?
settings.info: Normally, variants are selected from a drop-down menu. You might want your customers to be able to select a product variant by clicking a variant image.

settings.label: Show remaining quantity message?
settings.info: Show when less than (X) items are in stock, Show incoming stock transfer message when sold out.

settings.label: Show Product short description?
settings.info: If you will set this option to 'Excerpt' then you are able to set custom excerpt for each the description of the product (Metafields:meta.description_excerpt) or it will be cutted from the product content

settings.label: Excerpt length
settings.info: Number of words that will be displayed for each product content if you use 'Excerpt' mode and don't set custom excerpt for each product content.

settings.label: Use first available variant?
settings.info: Returns the variant object of the first product variant that is available for purchase.

settings.label: Remove sold out?
settings.info: Removing the variants that are sold out

settings.label: Use a back in stock notification form?
settings.info: When a customer submits the back in stock notification form for a sold out product, you will receive an email to the email address you have set up in the admin to be [your Customer email.](//help.shopify.com/assets/manual/customize/customer-email-03cea16d2eb80d21ad80f8dc559ea5bc1ae4ce9f2b19d6cb83711f1e6c2b63bb.jpg)

settings.content: With a back in stock notification form, customers can let you know if they want to be informed when a sold out product becomes available again. When a customer uses the form to submit their email address, you will be sent information about the product that they are interested in. When more stock becomes available, you can let the customer know.

settings.label: Use Add to cart full width?

settings.content: Metafields allow you to attach metadata, which is additional information, to a store's resources.

Metafields product countdown, Countdown to the end sale date will be shown. Be sure you have set final date of the product sale price. product.metafields.meta.countdown ( 2018/08/18 ) or (  2018/08/18 17:34:56 )
=== Metafields Vimeo or YouTube video url. For example: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1zPYW6Ipgok: meta.video
=== Metafields Insert tag that will be used to display images from instagram from your customers. For example: nike_rush_run: meta.hashtag
=== Metafields Insert username that will be used to display images from instagram from your customers. For example: asos_oliver : meta.username

settings.label: Image Position

settings.content: Consider this: a customer is shopping on your client’s page and scrolling through a product’s awesome description. The customer is getting excited to buy the product, but as they scroll further, they don’t see a buy button. They soon realize they have to scroll all the way back to the top to look for it, and in this moment, their excitement to buy the product is overshadowed by their need to search for the ‘add to cart’ button. Once this happens, your client might lose the customer’s interest and could potentially miss out on a sale.

settings.label: Other page
settings.info: Popup Newsletter will display on Other page

settings.label: Promo popup text
settings.info: Place here some promo text or use HTM
settings.default: Sign up our newsletter and save 25% off for the next purchase! Subscribe to our newsletters and don’t miss new arrivals, the latest fashion updates and our promotions.

settings.label: __ Popup delay
settings.info: Show popup after some time (in milliseconds). Integer

settings.label: __ Show after user scroll down the page
settings.info: Set the number of pixels users have to scroll down before popup opens (100 -5000). Integer

settings.label: Show after number of pages visited
settings.info: You can choose how much pages user should change before popup will be shown.

settings.label: Popup version
settings.info: If you change your promo popup you can increase its version to show the popup to all visitors again.

settings.label: Popup expires
settings.info: you will be able to specify when to expire the cookie. Once you check the "Do not show it anymore" checkbox

settings.label: Show cookies info
settings.info: Under EU privacy regulations, websites must make it clear to visitors what information about them is being stored. This specifically includes cookies. Turn on this option and user will see info box at the bottom of the page that your web-site is using cookies. . If set "Accept" next show will be after 60 days.

settings.label: Popup text
settings.info: Place here some information about cookies usage that will be shown in the popup.
settings.default: We use cookies to improve your experience on our website. Read about how we use cookies in our Privacy Policy. By browsing this website, you agree to our use of cookies.

settings.label: Page with details
settings.info: Choose page that will contain detailed information about your Privacy Policy

settings.label: Cookies version
settings.info: If you change your cookie policy information you can increase their version to show the popup to all visitors again.

settings.label: Popup expires
settings.info: you will be able to specify when to expire the cookie. Once you click the "ACCEPT" button

settings.label: Home page
settings.info: Popup Cookies will display on home page

settings.label: Product single
settings.info: Popup Cookies will display on Product single

settings.label: Collection page
settings.info: Popup Cookies will display on Collection page

settings.label: Article page
settings.info: Popup Cookies will display on Article page

settings.label: Blog page
settings.info: Popup Cookies will display on Blog page

settings.label: Cart page
settings.info: Popup Cookies will display on Cart page

settings.label: Other page
settings.info: Popup Cookies will display on Other page

settings.label: Show Age verification
settings.info: If you sell products such as wine, cigarettes, or dangerous goods, then you might want to discourage visitors under a certain age from browsing your website. You can do this by adding an age selection form to your storefront. Keep in mind that age verification is not the best way to prevent visitors from browsing your website, as there's nothing preventing them from lying about their age. It might even be a nuisance to regular visitors, who will have to make an additional click to access your store.

settings.label: Popup text
settings.info: Place here some information about cookies usage that will be shown in the popup.
settings.default: This website contains adult material and is only suitable for those 18 years or older. Click Enter only if you are at least 18 years of age.

settings.label: Age expires
settings.info: you will be able to specify when to expire the cookie. Once you click the "ENTER" button

settings.label: Age version
settings.info: If you change your age verification information you can increase their version to show the popup to all visitors again.

settings.content: To offer multiple currencies on your online store, you must first [edit your store's currency formatting](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/troubleshooting/help-script-find-money-formats).

settings.label: Enable currency conversion
settings.info: Even though prices are displayed in different currencies, orders will still be processed in your store's currency.

settings.label: Enable currency conversion Visitor
settings.info: Boost up your sales by showing your prices in the Visitor's Currency!

settings.label: Supported currencies
settings.default: EUR - EUR | USD - USD | GBP - GBP
settings.placeholder: EUR - Euro | USD - US Dollar | GBP - British Pound
settings.info: Use the country's ISO [currency code](http://www.xe.com/iso4217.php). Separate your currency codes with a space.

settings.content: If your customer is logged-in, the country in his default shipping address will be selected. If you are not sure about the  spelling to use here, refer to the first checkout page.

Do not forget to include the snippet shipping-calculator in your cart.liquid template where you want the shipping  calculator to appear. You can get the snippet here: [shipping-calculator.liquid](https://github.com/carolineschnapp/shipping-calculator/blob/master/shipping-calculator.liquid) .

settings.label: Image
settings.info: Shown when sharing a link on social media. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/troubleshooting/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images/) about image thumbnails.

settings.info: Upload image: png, ico, Will be scaled down to 152 x 152px

settings.content: Favicon Counter will display automatically the number of items in card on the browser tab each when user add to cart or remove any item. With funny icon on browser, this plugin helps to remind customers about the total number item in cart which they have and increase your sales.

settings.label: bgColor
